_description: Unified council feature registry linking maturity, fragility, governance policy context, and feature-level QA/security placeholders.

source_refs.notes: Complete implementation. Last finding: rubber-stamping detection (Cycle QA, fixed). Research benchmark refreshed for current operating cycle.
Governed: read events with attendees/body, meeting prep/debrief, enriched normalization. Target met.
Implemented migration runner + startup path with blocked/failed/migrated events and dry-run tests.
Implemented untrusted-content isolation prompts, hard-ban/output-contract enforcement, and contamination replay assertions.
Governed: deal pipeline, stage management, stale owner tracking, retrospective, auto-brief. Target met.
Incremental scan and dedup quality guardrails are now governed through policy and replay evidence.
Governed: document workflows now include SharePoint connector quality policy + friction evidence logging. Next: content extraction, document intelligence, and data room orchestration.
6-state lifecycle. Last finding: req.destroy ordering (Cycle 11, fixed).
Governed: ingestion, triage, draft generation, send via Graph. Missing: semantic search across email history.
Governed evaluation controls now include explicit pipeline policy thresholds, canary budgets, and drift guardrails.
Core architecture. 218 event types, 35 ledgers, dual-write. No findings in 4+ cycles.
Single sidecar. Execution boundary policy. No bypass. No findings in 4+ cycles. Research benchmark refreshed for current operating cycle.
Self-Improving: Builder Lane proposes governance changes, rubber-stamping detection, constitution check. Target met.
Entity-level overrides, PHI redaction. Last finding: case-sensitivity bypass.
Ingestion idempotency and duplicate-suppression thresholds are now governed with replay-gated validation.
Governed retrieval baseline now includes scoped query policy, citation requirements, and adversarial policy-block replay coverage.
Mail, Calendar, Planner, To Do, SharePoint. Last finding: ensureValidToken in reconcile. Research benchmark refreshed for current operating cycle.
Not present for current single-operator deployment; keep deferred/frozen until explicit multi-operator requirement is approved.
Implemented schema-versioning + upcasters, migration-aware startup controls, and evolution governance checks.
Governed: style guide, draft style, correction signals, cold-start archetypes, voice extraction. Missing: per-context style adaptation.
Implemented prompt registry config + runtime loader/fallback events and schema coverage tests.
Planner/To Do sync, dedup. Last finding: graphFetchWithRetry upgrade. Research benchmark refreshed for current operating cycle.
Cron matching, 6 gates, auto-dispatch. Last finding: DOW=7 Sunday (Cycle 11, fixed). Research benchmark refreshed for current operating cycle.
Implemented schema-version upcasting, migration manifest/state validation, and compatibility policy surfaces.
Self-Improving: circuit breakers, provider health, config drift, zombie drafts, noise reduction, dynamic autonomy. Target met.
Governed: SharePoint connector now runs with document-quality policy, connector friction telemetry, and operator-safe write controls. Next: content extraction + document intelligence layers.
Governed: GTD actions, waiting-for, Planner/To Do sync, reconciliation. Missing: auto-prioritization based on context.
